column1: Smoque BBQ////I had the St Louis half slab rib platter with mac and cheese and peach cobbler for my sides. It also came with coleslaw. The ribs were great - not as tender as baby back
column2: but really unique and tasty seasoning. The mac and cheese had great flavor
column3: but it was too runny. I would still probably deal and order. The coleslaw was tangy and delicious. Honestly
column4: the highlight was the cobbler. OH MY GOD. The crust is thick
column5: seasoned and crisp. The inside is warm
column7: with firm peaches. I had quite the experience eating that dessert.
